attributes.additional_details:
STOP UNFAIR CLAIMS OF EXPENCES -

MPs called back from holiday can claim back up to £3,750.00 for margaret-thatcher funeral

This is out of order being able claim back up to £3,750, that an insult on taxpayes after all these cuts, plus that more than a normal price of a holiday, so we down now to pay MPs holiday bills just for a funeral, HOW MANY WRONGS DOES IT TAKE MAKE IT RIGHT.

You cut everyone money and now we see where it goes it so wrong
